mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_post, mem_basic_address, mem_detail_address, mem_address_refer, mem_gender, mem_age, mem_phone, mem_email, email_status, mem_status, mem_nickname, mem_work, mem_level, mem_enrolldate, black_reason, black_date, report_count, origin_img_name, change_img_name from members where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_pwd = #{memPwd} and email_status = 'Y' and not mem_status = 'N'
select count(*) from members where mem_id = #{memId}
select count(*) from members where mem_nickname = #{memNickname}
select count(*) from members where mem_email = #{memEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into members( mem_no, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_post, mem_basic_address, mem_detail_address, mem_address_refer, mem_gender, mem_age, mem_phone, mem_email, email_status, mem_status, mem_nickname, mem_work, mem_level )values( seq_mem.nextval, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memPost}, #{memBasicAddress}, #{memDetailAddress}, #{memAddressRefer}, #{memGender}, #{memAge}, #{memPhone}, #{memEmail}, #{emailStatus}, #{memStatus}, #{memNickname}, #{memWork}, #{memLevel} )
mapper.select: select mem_no from members where mem_id = #{memId}
select mem_id, mem_email from members where mem_email = #{memEmail} and not mem_status = 'N'
select mem_id, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email from members join orders using (mem_no) where order_no = #{orderNo}
select count(*) from mem_cupon where mem_no = #{memNo}

select coupon_issue_num, coupon_no, mem_no, mc.coupon_kind, create_date, expire_date, status, use_date, coupon_name, c.coupon_kind coupon_category, coupon_price, coupon_pricerate from mem_cupon mc join coupon c using (coupon_no) where mem_no = 3 and status = 'Y';
select count(*) from members where mem_status = 'M'
select mem_no, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_email, mem_basic_address, mem_enrolldate from members where mem_status = 'M' order by mem_no asc
